channel.title: Cant figure out how to use scarscape
channel.description: i cant find anywhere on the scythe sight on how to use scarscape. this is ridiculous. they dont really talk about scar on that sight. can someone show me the commands

item.title: Cant figure out how to use scarscape
item.dc:creator: @Arkanor Arkanor
item.description:
@Arkanor wrote:

…

You don’t use SS, you interact with it like you would the normal RS client. Only, SS has no color change and the minimap is locked north. Handy for scripting. I don’t recommend using the arrow keys, because if I recall, that’s rather detectable.

Read full topic
item.source: Cant figure out how to use scarscape

item.title: Cant figure out how to use scarscape
item.dc:creator: @Chaos -Chaos-
item.description:
@Chaos wrote:

umm scarscape doesnt actually need a manual you can use the arrow keys to walk and something like L:V makes you walk from lummby to varry (i may be wrong on that one)

and thats kinda how you use scarscape no other commands i think

Read full topic
